title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Moved deployment guides for Azure, AWS, and GCP from `use-cases-and-examples/deploying` to `managing-workflow-runs-and-deployments/deploying-to-third-party-platforms`
Added `shortTitle` frontmatter and updated `intro` to start with "Learn how to" in all deployment guides
Removed "Introduction" sections and OIDC notes from guides
Added redirects from old paths to new locations
Added middleware to suppress 404 noise from Next.js assets on archived enterprise versions by returning 204
Added tests for static asset handling changes
summary:
- Moved deployment guides for Azure, AWS, and GCP from `use-cases-and-examples/deploying` to `managing-workflow-runs-and-deployments/deploying-to-third-party-platforms`

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
Based on the git diff, here's a concise summary:

### Summary
- Moved deployment guides for Azure, AWS, and GCP from `use-cases-and-examples/deploying` to `managing-workflow-runs-and-deployments/deploying-to-third-party-platforms`
- Added `shortTitle` frontmatter and updated `intro` to start with "Learn how to" in all deployment guides
- Removed "Introduction" sections and OIDC notes from guides
- Replaced "Additional resources" with "Further reading" sections
- Added redirects from old paths to new locations
- Added middleware to suppress 404 noise from Next.js assets on archived enterprise versions by returning 204
- Added tests for static asset handling changes

### Title
Reorganize deployment docs and suppress archived enterprise asset noise
